abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile talks about
            building macroeconomic stability and delivering services for
            the poor in Nigeria. Despite Nigeria’s strong economic track
            record, poverty is significant, and reducing it would
            require strong non-oil growth and a focus on human
            development. National Urban Water Sector Reform Project
            addressed the fundamental causes of the problem, and ensured
            improved governance at all levels. As a result, projects in
            various sectors had seen positive results in education,
            health, and the delivery of clean water in the country.
